page.title: 09Home Life Helen Soutter
page.content: It was a normal day, waking up in bed and just lying there for a few minutes. I struggled to get out of bed. I said "Now I suppose I'll get dressed and do my face, teeth and hair." So that's what I did. I went downstairs to see if breakfast was ready. I sat down and had Weetabix and toast. Then I went out to play on the swing and the climbing frame. My dad came out and asked if I would help him with the mowing. I emptied the wheelbarrow. Sometimes my dad lets me mow a bit but usually I don't hold it. He says it is a lot quicker if he does it. When I had finished doing that work I went indoors to have lunch.We had beef and potatoes.After lunch I had a cornet and then my brother and I played cricket-I lost by one run.At the end of the day I went to bed happily.
